title: Dark As the Grave Wherein My Friend Is Laid
description: Unpublished in his lifetime, this book returns to the Mexico of the author's "Under the Volcano". Sigbjorn Wilderness descends into an inferno of abysses, labyrinths and demons to confront his past and his destiny. His search finally takes him to the scene of the worst terrors of his drunken past.
author: Malcolm Lowry
